info.name: Transparent Shiki Theme
info.description:
Transparent Shiki theme with custom background.
Provided with Akira Kurosawa's Yojimbo and Sakurakou K-ON Bu backgrounds.
info.additionalInfo:
Don't look at my code please -_-
It's awful.

options.label: Shorten huge posts
Never shorten posts
0.6 - semi-transparent (recommended)
0.7 - less transparent
0.8 - less opaque
0.9 - max opacity (almost full black)
